summary: Your Skyrim character can now have the eyes of a ghoul!
descriptionHtml:
STEAM VERSION: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=310811725]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=310811725[/url]


[color=red]SUBMIT SOME IMAGES, PLEASE![/color]


[b]--Summary--[/b] 
This mod adds a pair of ghoul eyes from the new anime [i]Tokyo Ghoul[/i] into Skyrim's race menu for player customization. The texture size is 512x512 (Normal Skyrim eyes are 128x128). 

Yes, the eyes are bloodshot, you just can't see them well in the image.



[b]-To Do List-[/b] 
-Add single left and right eye versions. 



[b]Bugs?[/b] 
Please inform me if there are any!
author: Kyle8497

files.name: Eyes - Tokyo Ghoul
files.changelogHtml:
Fixes:

-Fixed the floating eye problem for every race.
-Made the bloodshot part of the eyes more visible and bold.
